snippet: The Federal Emergency Management Agency again denied Gov. Jan Brewer’s request for a disaster declaration for the Yarnell Hill fire, which killed 19 firefighters.
abstract: Federal Emergency Management Agency again denies Arizona Gov Jan Brewer’s request for a disaster declaration for the Yarnell Hill fire, which killed 19 firefighters.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Emergency Management Agency again denied Gov. Jan Brewer’s request for a disaster declaration for the Yarnell Hill fire, which killed 19 firefighters.

headline.main: Arizona: Aid Appeal for Fire Damage Rejected
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Aid Appeal For Fire Damage Rejected
